name: Our Favorite Beef Stroganoff
author: Jennifer McSparin
summary: Garlic, basil, and thyme bring extra flavor to this easy ground beef stroganoff made with cream of mushroom soup and sour cream. Serve over cooked egg noodles.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
1 dash salt and ground black pepper
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (4.5 ounce) can mushroom pieces and stems, drained
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add garlic, thyme, basil, salt, and pepper
Add cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, and mushrooms
Reduce heat and simmer until flavors meld, about 20 minutes
Fold in sour cream just before serving
